oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bayonet, Springfield 1906 and scabbard, RIA 1907
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This model 1906 bayonet is marked on the front riccaso "S A" (Springfield Armory), an ordnance bomb symbol, 1906," and the reverse carries the serial number "112709." It is accompanied by a brown leather scabbard with an attached steel belt hanger device Stamped into the leather on the reverse side just below the blued steel frog is "R.I.A. (Rock Island Arsenal) /1907 / H.E.K." This mark identfies the place of manufacture, the year and the inspector.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
